cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT' IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITA1WIC M.A3 ESTY' S GK)WRH3pfl) ,S E 0 E E T,OiiPc-3531, C i B I I B TEGYPTrDecipher telegram from Lord Allonby No. 24, of 17th January,; 1922.MOST URGENT My telegram No. 20. Expected secessions from Wafd hove not yet occurred, 1 understand from a.source in close touch with that group of Wafd, that they are resolved either to dictate policyof Wafd in which they now form a majority or to secede,. They state that they could not support Sarwat PashaOpenly, hut they would be benevolently neutral and endeavourto help unobtrusively*Ho,, 5 in. CP. 3614*
